properties.name: rosette.admin-mail-to
properties.description: Mail address to administrator. Help request will be sent to this address.

properties.name: rosette.base-url
properties.description: Must be a public accessible url to the Rosette application

properties.name: rosette.cordate-url
properties.description: Must be a public accessible url to the Cordate web application.

properties.name: rosette.default-mail-from
properties.description: Mail sent from Rosette will have this address in the from field.

properties.name: rosette.jwt-secret-token
properties.description: A secret token for JWT authentication. Must be at least 10 characters long.

properties.name: rosette.file-client-cache-max-age
properties.description: Number of seconds that files should be cached on client.

properties.name: rosette.files-path
properties.description: Folder where all assets will be stored. Rosette must have write permissions to that folder.
